testcase.name: 01 Display Platform for each Flight
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed Then All Flights loads which I have access to...............................passed When I search/filter for a particular result................................passed And Click on Apply button...................................................passed Then All Flights matching search/filter combination load as results.........passed And There icons for platforms are displayed.................................passed And Tooltips shown on mouseover on each platform icon.......................passed
